车前草车轮菜蛤蚂草 Plantain 车前草又名车轮菜,为车前科多年生草本。生长在山野、路旁、花圃、河边等地。根茎短缩肥厚,密生须状根。叶全部根生,叶片平滑.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, from Latin plantago, plantagin-, from planta 'sole of the foot' (because of its broad prostrate leaves)
mid 16th cent.: from Spanish plá(n)tano, probably by assimilation of a South American word to the Spanish plá(n)tano 'plane tree'

entry.tran: （可以当蔬菜烹饪食用的）大蕉
entry.def: A plantain is a type of green banana which can be cooked and eaten as a vegetable.
A plantain is a wild plant with broad leaves and a head of tiny green flowers on a long stem.

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous plants of the genus Plantago; mostly small roadside or dooryard weeds with elliptic leaves and small spikes of very small flowers; seeds of some used medicinally
2. a banana tree bearing hanging clusters of edible angular greenish starchy fruits; tropics and subtropics
3. starchy banana-like fruit; eaten (always cooked) as a staple vegetable throughout the tropics
